name: Messages
description: Interact with macOS Messages.app - send and read iMessages

tools.name: send_message
tools.description: Send an iMessage to a phone number

tools.name: read_messages
tools.description: Read message history from a specific contact

tools.name: get_unread_messages
tools.description: Get all unread messages from all contacts
